description: Commands to manage data dog settings for the container apps environment.

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry data-dog delete
commands.summary: Delete container apps environment telemetry data dog settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry data-dog delete --name
                                              --resource-group
                                              [--no-wait]
                                              [--yes]
examples: az containerapp env telemetry data-dog delete -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry data-dog set
commands.summary: Create or update container apps environment telemetry data dog settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry data-dog set --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           [--enable-open-telemetry-metrics {false, true}]
                                           [--enable-open-telemetry-traces {false, true}]
                                           [--key]
                                           [--no-wait]
                                           [--site]
examples:
az containerapp env telemetry data-dog set -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup \
    --site dataDogSite --key dataDogKey --enable-open-telemetry-traces true --enable-open-telemetry-metrics true

commands.name: az containerapp env telemetry data-dog show
commands.summary: Show container apps environment telemetry data dog settings.
commands.syntax:
az containerapp env telemetry data-dog show --name
                                            --resource-group
examples: az containerapp env telemetry data-dog show -n MyContainerappEnvironment -g MyResourceGroup
